articles.description: Even though they were blown out by the Knicks on Sunday, the Celtics will happily take Sunday's ugly outcome if star point guard Kemba Walker continues to feel as good moving forward as he did after making his season debut.
articles.content:
BOSTON -- Little went right for the Celtics in a 105-75 shellacking at the hands of the New York Knicks on Sunday afternoon at TD Garden.
But the Celtics will happily take the ugly outcome if star p… [+5822 chars]

articles.author: Mike Reiss
articles.title: Buffalo Bills fans donate to Lamar Jackson-backed charity after victory over Baltimore Ravens - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Bills fans have donated more than $75,000 to a charity supported by Lamar Jackson in the hours after Buffalo's postseason victory over Baltimore.
articles.content: Thousands of fans are celebrating the Buffalo Bills' first trip to the AFC Championship Game since the 1993 season in a unique way -- by donating tens of thousands of dollars to a charity that Baltim… [+1551 chars]
